name: LD40 GEWTW
description: In GEWTW You help the masses down under that fancy factory exit hole by shoving all the things they are asking for with the most efficient "Need Delivery Device," a bulldozer; maybe even a clean one.  The squirming masses will ask for more and more as you supply their demands, soon even the people's begging for Burgers have little place to keep them yet still they DEMAND more!  Supply them.
